attributes.action: bring back the death sentance for serious crimes, rape, murder ect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i belive that the death senence should be brought back for serious crimes as today people who commit murder get sent to prison and it does not seem to act as a detterent, it should be an eye for and eye a tooth for a tooth.as it used to be

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
